name: The Starting Room
description: You are in a dimly lit starting room. The walls are made of rough stone, and a faint light emanates from a crack in the ceiling. The air is cool and smells of damp earth. There is an exit to the north.

name: A Long Hallway
description: You are in a long, winding hallway. Torches flicker on the walls, casting dancing shadows. The path seems to stretch on endlessly. There is a small room to the south.
